string.text: CS-3a body armor
PSZ-9d Duty Armor
PS5-M Universal Protection
Exoskeleton
Bulat armored suit

This exoskeleton provides outstanding protection against bullet and fragmentation damage at the cost of mobility. Vulnerable to armor-piercing rounds.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]5 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kV
Exoskeleton

A military armored suit made for assault operations. Provides outstanding protection against full metal jacket rounds and fragmentation damage without reducing the wearer's mobility. Vulnerable to armor-piercing rounds.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]5 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kV
Military armored suit
Light overcoat
A standard military overcoat that will keep the wearer warm during rain and strong winds. It offers little to no protection but allows a single armour attachment by default.
Overcoat

A long and padded overcoat. It it enforced with special padding around the torso and head which allows it to serve as low grade anti-anomaly armor. It is best used in conjunction with a gasmask or closed-breathing helmet. It allows the application of a single armour attachment by default.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]5 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kV
Heavy overcoat

A long and thick overcoat with extra padding for added protection. Can serve as low grade anti-anomaly armor but is best used in conjunction with a gasmask or closed-breathing helmet. It allows the application of a single armour attachment by default.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]5 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kV
SEVA bodysuit
Berill-5M armored suit kit
Sphere M12 headgear set

A titanium helmet with a cloth exterior that comes with pockets for additional steel armor pieces and an armor face mask. Sphere M12 is normally used as part of a combination that includes PSZ series Spetsnaz body armor. The gas mask was designed for use by the Russian MVD but never went into mass production. Small quantities are still used and in use by MVD troops however. Quite popular in the Zone thanks to its stock, fully opearational, heavy respirator and a standard military issue 1PN93-1 night vision device. It is the heaviest and most advanced combat helmet available in the Zone, providing maximum head protection possible and advanced electronics mounting interface.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] M12 titanium helmet %c[0,170,170,170]2420 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class IV anti-ballistic visor %c[0,170,170,170]370 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] breathing apparatus %c[0,170,170,170]145 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PMK 40mm breathing filter %c[0,170,170,170]390 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. %c[0,170,170,170]1550 g
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]144 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]34 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]67 kV
M40 steel helmet

A standard steel russian army helmet without any additions. Provides no protection against anomalies or radiation, but can deflect bullets - effectively preventing damage to head areas it covers. This helmet was never particularly popular in the Zone, except for use in brief armed conflicts between factions.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] M40 steel helmet %c[0,170,170,170]2480 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class AIII anti-ballistic visor %c[0,170,170,170]190 g
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]neglectable
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]1 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]15 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]28 kV
SSP-99 headgear set

Envirnoment protection helmet which has been unmounted from a SSP-99 Ecologist full-body protection system along with complete, closed respiratory system. It features an airtight visor intended for complete insulation from outside envirnoment conditions. Its intended use may very well be in combination with military suits for operations in highly anomalous areas.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] v99 airtight visor %c[0,170,170,170]3290 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] SSP closed resp. module %c[0,170,170,170]1460 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] IDA-71 ox. canister module %c[0,170,170,170]3720 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PS8 psi influence damper %c[0,170,170,170]1160 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PN21KL nvd with mount. %c[0,170,170,170]1110 g
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]254 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]10 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]62 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]270 kV
EO-19 PBF gas mask

A regular plastic and rubber gas mask, used for breathing filtering air for radioactive particles and poisonous substances. Widely used by rookies and veterans of all factions due to its universal functionality. Does not provide any physical protection.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PBF gas mask %c[0,170,170,170]760 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 2x EO-19 breathing filter %c[0,170,170,170]210 g
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]96 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]2 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]neglectable
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]64 kV
PMK headgear set

Heavier and more durable version of standard gasmask. Comes with thicker and larger breathing filters which provides better protection to radiation and toxicity even when damaged. Reinforced construction makes it more durable to physical stress at the cost of extra weight. This heavy gas mask was designed for use by the Ukranian Spetsnaz but never went into mass production. Small quantities are still in use by some branches of the Ukrainian ministry of defence.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PMK gas mask %c[0,170,170,170]990 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PMK 40mm breathing filter %c[0,170,170,170]390 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. %c[0,170,170,170]1550 g
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]144 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]3 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]neglectable
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]76 kV
Sphere 08 headgear set

A modern, quality, western-made combat helmet with build in breathing filtered respiratory system. It is not known how it made its way into the Zone. The helmet is designed to provide a squad leader with strategic superiority over the enemy via its many scanners and satellite communications devices, which have not been installed in this particular helmet. Comes with multi-layered Kevlar protection and armored elements to user from physical damage. As it is made entirely from composites it does not conduct electricity, rising users overall electrical resistance.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Sphere 08 kevlar helmet %c[0,170,170,170]1580 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Class III anti-ballistic visor %c[0,170,170,170]240 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] breathing apparatus %c[0,170,170,170]120 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 2x PDE-1 breathing filter %c[0,170,170,170]330 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. %c[0,170,170,170]1550 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] electronics interface %c[0,170,170,170]30 g
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]22 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]174 kV
Sunrise bodysuit
Freedom Guard bodysuit

This lightweight stalker bodysuit is made by Freedom craftsmen. The suit's fabric is treated with Horizon, a special solution developed by the faction by trial and error to increase resistance to anomalies. Like the Sunrise suit, the Wind of Freedom comes with built-in body armor and armour attachment modules.
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Sphere 08 kevlar helmet %c[0,170,170,170]390 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters %c[0,170,170,170]390 g
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. %c[0,170,170,170]390 g
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters %c[0,170,170,170]390 g
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]5 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kV
Wind of Freedom bodysuit

This modern version of the Duty bodysuit is better suited for stalker recruits who are used to lightweight suits. Unlike the PSZ series, this suit provides good protection against anomalies while also being capable of stopping a pistol bullet. The suit cannot be modified with an armour attachment module, but may be upgraded with a combat support system instead.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]5 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kV

This modern military armored suit is designed for assault operations in anomalous areas. Mainly desighned for Spetsnaz Units on high risk operations. Comprises a PSZ-12p heavy military armored suit, built-in compensation suit, and an anomalous protection bodysuit. The armor provides excellent protection against bullet and fragmentation damage, without greatly reducing the wearer's mobility. Comes with built-in armour attachment modules.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]5 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kV

This bodysuit, intended for conducting research in the Zone, combines a closed-cycle respiratory module and an external isolation coating, resulting in excellent protection from anomalies. Due to poor protection from physical impact, the suit is not a good defense against bullet and fragmentation damage. Comes with a built-in armour attachment module.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]5 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kV

This suit, produced by one of Kiev's Defense Research Institutes, is a great alternative to homemade stalker suits. While its built-in body armor can only stop a pistol round, the anomaly and radiation protection system is second to none. Fully upgradeable and boasting two built-in armour attachment modules, this bodysuit is the equipment of choice for many experienced stalkers.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]5 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kV

This item comprises military PS5 series body armor with beryllium sputter modified for use in the Zone. Designed for assault operations in highly radioactive areas, it is ineffective in areas of high anomalous activity. The suit makes its way to stalkers through the military, who exchange it for loot. Comes with built-in armour attachment modules.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]5 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kV

This DIY stalker bodysuit is a combination of a bodysuit of twin-layered rubberized cloth with plexiglass lining and built-in body armor. Despite the fact that the body armor is incapable of protecting the wearer from even pistol bullets, the suit enjoys great popularity due to its low cost and modification potential. Comes with built-in armour attachment modules.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]5 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kV

This stalker bodysuit with reinforced body armor made by Freedom craftsmen represents a good compromise between combat and anomaly protection. The built-in body armor comprises armor plating and ten Kevlar layers, capable of stopping a pistol bullet. The suit uses the relatively expensive Sovereign compound for anomaly protection. Comes with an armour attachment module.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]5 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kV

This early model of the Duty bodysuit is the Spetsnaz PSZ-9 body armor modified for the Zone. The suit is capable of stopping a rifle bullet, however, this level of protection comes at the cost of its weight, bulkiness and virtually non-existent anomaly protection. The suit cannot be modified with an armour attachment module, but may be upgraded with a combat support system.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Psy protecion %c[0,170,170,170]5 mt
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Electricity res. %c[0,170,170,170]5 kV

Once used as standard by Clear Sky assault squads, after the faction’s elimination this armor serves as a reminder that even an excellent protective bodysuit cannot guarantee your safety.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2this side of the perimeter. The armor is capable of stopping a pistol bullet, while the wearer is also well protected from anomalies. Comes with a built-in armour attachment module.

An experimental sample of a military exoskeleton. Was never mass-produced due to extraordinary cost and some design flaws. Despite this, it is in demand due to its ability to take on the weight of all carried equipment, and therefore small batches are made in underground facilities outside Ukraine. The exoskeleton suit is a very expensive suit and anyone who wears one of these should be avoided unless you have a death wish.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:

A SSP-99 chemical protection suit specifically designed for the zones conditions. It is used primarily by scientific expeditions and the eco-stalkers who co-operate with them. It has an intergrated air filtering and conditioning system offering excellent protection against radiation and chemical exposure, includes an anomaly suppression system, and uses a fabric which offers excellent heat and electrical resistance. It isn't designed for combat, so it provides neither bullet or splinter protection. Includes a container capable of holding 2 artifacts.
 
%c[0,170,170,170]COMPONENTS:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] 1PN93-1 nvd with mount. 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] PDE-1 medium breathing filters
 
%c[0,170,170,170]ENVIRNOMENTAL PROTECTION:
 
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Toxicity res. %c[0,170,170,170]126 C1 ppm eq.
%c[0,153,255,255] • %c[0,140,140,140] Thermal / acid. %c[0,170,170,170]4 kw / m2this side of the perimeter. The armor is capable of stopping a pistol bullet, while the wearer is also well protected from anomalies. Comes with a built-in armour attachment module.

High quality modified SSP-99 suit. It provides increased body protection from bullet and splinter damage. It is designed for the guards working with scientific expeditions. It provides good protection from radiation and biological anomalies. It is resistant to chemically aggressive environments and other effects dangerous to the body. Includes a container capable of holding 2 artifacts.
